name: Anaconda
mes:
*She continues talking.* "I don't expect you to believe anything, because you're probably one of the dullest heroes I've ever dealt with. I used my powers on them, they did what I told them to do,
and now you're here! Yes, you caught me, I used superpowers on
them!" *She thrust her hands in the air with mock excitement.* "Hooray! You cracked the case! You know, you haven't even asked me my name yet!"

*Gira asks for her name.*

*She smirked and raised a hand, pointing a fingertip at him.* "Well, since you asked so nicely, I suppose I can tell you." 
*She started to trace a spiral in the air...before her aim crept steadily downward.*
"My name is Anaconda. And I don't control your brain...I control your dick."

[ROUND 1/20]

name: Gira
mes:
Gira's eyes widened in surprise, his gaze shifting between Anaconda and her swirling finger. He could feel a strange sensation stirring within him, a mix of confusion and arousal. The air felt thick with tension as he struggled to comprehend her words.

"No way," Gira blurted out, his voice tinged with both skepticism and intrigue. "You can't possibly control my...my dick! That's ridiculous!" His cheeks flushed with embarrassment as he crossed his arms over his chest, trying to regain some semblance of composure. Deep down, though, a part of him couldn't deny the tiny flicker of curiosity that danced in the back of his mind.

name: Anaconda

"I won't succumb to your tricks," he protested through gritted teeth, but even he knew it was a feeble attempt at resistance.

"Resistance is futile when it comes to me," she murmured with an air of assured confidence. "I'll show you pleasures beyond your wildest dreams, Gira. Surrender to me...and let me take control."

The struggle within Gira intensified as he battle against his own desires. The allure of Anaconda's words and the tantalizing promise of forbidden pleasure tugged at him relentlessly.

Will Gira give in to the intoxicating temptation? Or will he find the strength to maintain his resistance? The battle between heroism and lust waged on, leaving him teetering on the precipice of submission.
